extension.summary:
Updated for Kodi Matrix! Kodi client for connecting to your MOTR server. Convert, stream or download your movies in Kodi on the go.
Remember queue is common for all users, hold the line.
Addon has been tested with Android, Nvidia Shield, Linux/OpenElec, Mac and Windows.
extension.description: Movies On The Run (MOTR) Client for Kodi
extension.news: Support for v19 Matrix, now a Video-plugin, fixed https for selfsigned servers
extension.disclaimer: Session, username and password are stored in clear text in Kodi, use other clients for security
